meanings.sent1: The coresearchers worked as a team to study the plants.
meanings.sent2: I am looking for coresearchers to help me with my project.
meanings.sent3: The coresearchers found a funny way to collect data on animal behavior.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration as coresearchers was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The group of coresearchers made the research process enjoyable and efficient.

meanings.definition: The act of conducting research together.
meanings.sent1: Coresearchers must communicate effectively to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project depended on the coresearchers' teamwork.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the coresearchers accidentally spilled coffee on the lab notes.
meanings.sent4: Their coresearchers' efforts intertwined seamlessly to produce groundbreaking results.
meanings.sent5: The coresearchers' dedication to their work was evident in every step of the process.
